nodes.text: Ro-roos were creatures that existed in the galaxy.

Ro-roos were to be mentioned in an extended scene of Han Solo's and Chewbacca's first meeting at Mimban from the 2018 Star Wars Anthology film Solo: A Star Wars Story. The deleted scene was first revealed on the film's home video release. Ro-roos originated from the Star Wars Legends massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided with the release of the 2005 expansion pack Rage of the Wookiees.
